content: I have created an enhancement to cargo dev bless to ignore test output files that are older than target/debug/cargo-clippy. Before I open a PR, does this sound like a good idea? Personally, I often run into the issue where bless updates the wrong files after running ui tests with TESTNAME=. There would also be cargo dev bless --ignore-timestamp to disable this feature.
Yes, I think that's a good idea :thumbs_up:
